column5: Wow, talk about a voice from the past LOL Good to hear from you Roger, it's been a very loooong time.

It has! Lot's of new stuff happening to me. Changed careers. Working more than ever but I wished I got into this 30 years ago! ago. My kids are almost grown up. Both made honour rolls which really makes me question if they are really mine!  But that aside how's everybody doing here?  Roger
Been sometime Roger, Great to hear from you. Still hanging around here and fishing every chance I get.Â  My work hours have reduced. I love it. LOL
